dialogues.dialogue_intro: Good lord I appear to be dead
dialogues.dialogue_end: Find out who killed me, pronto.
dialogues.generic_timeline: Dracula? I was sleeping in my coffin all night!
dialogues.generic_wherewereyou: I was in the crypt. As usual.
dialogues.evidence_wine_glass_owner: Well clearly I own this wine glass as I do everything in this mansion
dialogues.evidence_wine_glass_appearance: It's made out of glass, stained red by the blood that's in it
